description: The Reassign Group operation (POST only) allows the administrator of an organization to reassign a group to another member of the organization. http://resources.arcgis.com/en/help/arcgis-rest-api/#/Reassign_Group/02r300000067000000/
title: reassignGroup

success.description: Indicates if the operation was successful

groupId.description: The ID of the reassigned group
